name: semantic-weaver
description: Obsidian plugin for managing RDF-based ontologies, semantic annotation, visualization, and export.

structure.description: Plugin entry point. Handles lifecycle, settings, RDF logic, UI commands, and event registration.
Obsidian plugin manifest. Declares plugin id, name, version, and compatibility.
NPM package manifest. Lists dependencies, scripts, and metadata for build and development.
TypeScript configuration. Sets compiler options and included/excluded files.
Build configuration for esbuild. Transpiles TypeScript to JavaScript for plugin distribution.
Custom styles for Semantic Weaver modals, views, and UI components. Supports light/dark themes.
Utility functions for RDF parsing, ontology loading, CML/CMLD parsing, export, and GitHub deployment.
Settings interface, default values, and settings tab for plugin configuration in Obsidian.
Obsidian ItemView for interactive RDF graph visualization (2D/3D) using Cytoscape and ForceGraph3D.
Obsidian ItemView for visualizing RDF/canvas data as Mermaid diagrams.
Modal dialog for adding RDF-Star or semantic annotations to selected text.
Modal dialog for editing CMLD (Context Markup Language for Documentation) metadata in notes.
Modal dialog for configuring export settings (GitHub repo, export dir, provider, etc.).
Modal dialog for managing RDF namespaces and editing ontology Turtle.
Modal dialog for editing semantic properties of canvas nodes.
Modal dialog for editing semantic properties of canvas edges.
Modal dialog for running SPARQL queries on canvas or RDF data.
Modal dialog for looking up and inserting URIs from namespaces or ontology.
React component for faceted search UI over RDF-enhanced documents.
React component for rendering RDF graphs using Cytoscape.
React component for rendering RDF triples as a table from JSON-LD.
Getting started guide for installing and using the plugin.
MkDocs configuration for exporting documentation.
Tutorial for authoring CML and CMLD in Markdown notes.
Test RDF metadata in JSON format for validation and development.
Test Markdown file with CML/CMLD and Mermaid diagram for plugin validation.
